name: Robot Rumpus Royale
description:
The year is 2082. Robot battles are all the rage. Fans flock from all four corners of the globe to watch robots duke it out. Competitors rent a bot and send it against a series of other bots. If their bot falls, they lose. But if their bot wins, then the competitors will gain fame and glory (and maybe even a sponsorship) beyond their wildest dreams! You are the latest competitor to challenge the arena. You are randomly assigned a rental bot. Maybe you’ll become the newest champion of the arena. Maybe you’ll fail miserably. Maybe you’re just here to listen to the goofy robot voices. And maybe you’ll get a new friend out of the deal. Who knows!

Get your bot and go forth!

  • Turn-based interactive fiction singleplayer battle royale. Try saying THAT three times fast!
  • Customize your robots’ movesets!
  • Fully voice-acted robot!
  • Fight your way through five encounters!
  • Come out on top...or get sent to the junkyard!
  • Featuring photography from Unsplash.com
  • Featuring sound effects from Zapsplat.com
  • Featuring voice acting from text2speech.org
  • Featuring music by Alexander Nakarada

NOTE: this game was made for a 48-hour game jam. That should explain a lot.
